channel.title: CAS Authentication :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video CAS Authentication We’ve already studied Central Authentication Service (CAS) as one method for authenticating users through a third party service. In this case, CAS is the service commonly used at K-State for authentication, which is why we like to cover it in our examples. So, let’s look at how to add CAS authentication to our application through Passport. Installing a Passport Strategy First, we’ll need to install a new Passport.
